property.name: cardClass
property.label: Card CSS Class
property.description: CSS Classes for the wrapping card div

property.name: objectName
property.label: Imported Object
property.description: Object API Name of the records to be imported

property.name: lookupField
property.label: Lookup Field
property.description: Field API Name to be initialised with the current page record ID (if any) upon import

property.name: importMode
property.label: Import Mode
property.description: Upsert vs Insert only import operation

property.name: maxRows
property.label: Max. #Rows
property.description: Max number of rows allowed per import (0 or empty meaning no limit)

property.name: allowedFields
property.label: Allowed Fields
property.description: JSON list of field API Names allowed to be imported

property.name: isAllOrNone
property.label: All or None?
property.description: Flag to control error handling upon import (false means importing all OK records).
